pr_title: Skip Version Verification and Update in BOM Releases

timeline.message: Skip version verification and update for BOM releases

timeline.bodyText:
This should be:
Skip.UpdatePackageVersion: true
Skip.VersionVerification: true
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,6 +2,9 @@ parameters:
   Artifacts: []
   SDKType: bom
   ServiceDirectory: not-specified
+  Skip:
+    UpdatePackageVersion: true

replies.bodyText: I was wondering what the syntax on this was 😃
replies.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Updated to use Skip.UpdatePackageVersion and Skip.VersionVerification.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Update skip parameters to the correct format
